game.name: Loreen's Purgatory
game.categories: Single-player, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get ready to be hunted by monsters, surprised by jump scares, and tested by the rage-inducing obstacles! Get ready to conquer Loreen's Purgatory! if you can...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready to be hunted by monsters, surprised by jump scares, and tested by the rage-inducing obstacles! Get ready to conquer Loreen's Purgatory! if you can...
